EmailTemplate.name: 201906_Americas_SpiritAero_PrimusElite_MC.201906_Americas_Email2_SpiritAero-DU87
EmailTemplate.subject: See Why This NASCAR Champ Chose Primus Elite!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Why NASCAR Champion Brad Keselowski Chose DU-875 LCD Displays The Honeywell DU-875/885 display upgrade replaces those old cathode ray tubes with modern LCDs, removing obsolescence and updating the cockpit with the latest technology. For two-time NASCAR Champion, Brad Keselowski, having the latest and greatest equipment that is maintained for safety is a top priority. "I chose to upgrade to new DU-875 displays because of the financial and operational benefits. My plane is essential for helping me manage my racing schedule and my business needs. I have a tight travel window each week and the plane allows me to arrive at the track on time, to travel to sponsor commitments, and most importantly - get quickly home for family time following the race." Brad Keselowski, NASCAR Champion
"My copilot and I have really clear and well-defined images on the new DU-875 LCDs. And with the PEEF (Primus Elite Enhanced Features) upgrade, we get our charts, georeferenced taxiways, and XM Weather." Joey Meier, Pilot for Brad Keselowski
Ready to experience the DU-875/885 display units and Primus Elite for yourself? Contact Spirit Aeronautics today at 614-333-8540 <tel:614-333-8540> or online by clicking below and filling out the form.
CONTACT SPIRIT AERONAUTICS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/three-options-for-upgrading-to-primus-elite?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_spiritaero_pe&utm_content=customer+form+fill]]>
